name: xfdcloser
description: Wikipedia userscript that helps assess pages for WikiProjects

scripts.build:bundle: npm run mkdir-dist && browserify xfdcloser-src/App.js --debug -t babelify --outfile dist/core.js
scripts.build:concat: npm run mkdir-dist && concat-cli -f "core-comment-top.js" dist/core.min.js "core-comment-bottom.js" -o dist/core-gadget.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run globals:window && npm run build:loader:dev && npm run build:css && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:loader: npm run build:loader:dev && npm run build:loader:gadget
scripts.build:minify: npm run mkdir-dist && uglifyjs dist/core.js --compress -b ascii_only=true,beautify=false --output dist/core.min.js
scripts.build:quickdev: npm run globals:window && npm run build:loader:dev && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build: npm run globals:window && npm run build:loader && npm run lint && npm run test:all && npm run build:css && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:minify && npm run build:concat
scripts.lint:dev: npm run lint:es6 && npm run lint:es5:dev && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:es6:fix && npm run lint:bin:fix && npm run lint:css:fix
scripts.lint: npm run lint:es6 && npm run lint:es5 && npm run lint:css
scripts.test: npm run globals:node && mocha --require @babel/register --reporter list && npm run globals:window
